text: Hilsa is a common name for Tenualosa ilisha a fish found in Bangladesh and India. Hilsa may also refer to: *Hilsa (genus), a genus of fishes containing a single species, Hilsa kelee, found in the Indian and Pacific Oceans *Hilsa, Bihar, a city and a notified area in the Indian state of Bihar *Hilsa, Nepal, a town in Nepal
title: Hilsa (disambiguation)
